are you sure the update-grub command mentioned the 2.6.31 version of the kernel?

As per post #26 https://bugs.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/grub/+bug/470265, you could try this to regenerate the menu.lst: " sudo mv /boot/grub/menu.lst /boot/grub/menu.lst.safe " and then running " sudo update-grub " Then you need to check the menu.lst again BEFORE reboot.
